eventSequenceNo.description: An event counter that increments as list of capacities gets updated

internal.description: true - capacity data produced by internal Nord Pool Matcher. false - capacity data came

publicationTime.description: When the ATC data was received from the Capacity system

deliveryAreaStart.description: Delivery start date, expressed as Long for performance reasons

deliveryAreaEnd.description: Delivery end date, expressed as Long for performance reasons

updatedAt.description: Last modification time (status change) of data
